## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To achieve the discount while meeting demand, and provide a buffer for demand variability. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Lower than player's planned order, allowing for more flexibility in adjusting to actual demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.4 days                              |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 3 days                                 |
| Comments                          |  Utilizing the discount while ensuring sufficient stock for at least 3 days of demand, even with potential variability. |
